{{cpp/chrono/month/title|1=ok}}
{{cpp/chrono/month/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr bool ok() const noexcept;
}}
Checks if the month value stored in {{c|*this}} is in the valid range, i.e., {{closed range|1|12}}.

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the month value stored in {{c|*this}} is in the range {{closed range|1|12}}. Otherwise {{c|false}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    for (const unsigned mm : {6u, 0u, 16U})
    {
        std::cout &lt;&lt; mm &lt;&lt; ": ";
        const std::chrono::month m{mm};
        m.ok() ? std::cout &lt;&lt; "month is valid\n"
               : std::cout &lt;&lt; "month is invalid\n";
    }
}
|output=
6: month is valid
0: month is invalid
16: month is invalid
}}
